Future front-end developer

Hi there, I'm Ashley Grigsby. I love to learn new things, and I enjoy work that challenges me to find solutions to problems. Front-end web development is my latest adventure. I spend days learning, writing and tweaking code. I enjoy the process, and I look forward to a successful career in web development.
